title: Macbook A2337 A and D
message:
Only A and D working on the keyboard.
Customer had their motherboard replaced from Apple. They had also quoted for the topcase for keyboard issue but the customer declined.

Tried a Known good keyboard.
Installed the board on a known good chasis. 
Still the same. Only A and D work. Nothing else

Weird Issue.

title: Macbook A2337 A and D
message:
Really weird.
No reaction at all on any other key?

KB information goes to M1 through the same SPI bus as TP.
Check all IPD related components from page 77.

title: Macbook A2337 A and D
message:
Everything looks okay to me.
Installed this board on yet another chasis. and in this one it works properly.

I am so confused.
Even used this working trackapd and flex on other chasis and keyboards but the same.
